fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, you may attack a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When roleblocked, you are informed, and have the option to immediately kill and clean your roleblocker in addition to your target.
- RB Immune
- Each successful kill gives you one Bloodlust. Bloodlust resets if you ever have a night without killing anyone.
- At 2 Bloodlust, your next attack is a powerful rampage. This resets Bloodlust. Kills from this rampage can give you Bloodlust.
- You kill and clean your jailor if they do not execute you.
